text.name: £10 instead of £29.99 (from LotusLite) for a 24-pack of 'the natural skinny pill', £18 for a 60-pack - save up to 67%
text.promo: Get a 24 or 60 pack of: LotusLite's 'natural skinny pill'. Ingredients inc. lotus leaf, green tea & more. Just take 1 or 2 pills per day.

text.name: £12 instead of up to £30 for three Cheerobics® classes at Cheerobics® - get fit and save up to 60%
text.promo: Dance your way to fitness with 3 Cheerobics® classes. Classes uniquely combine cheerleading and aerobics. Each session lasts up to one hour. Available Sunday - Thursday. Choose from several UK locations (see map for details).

text.name: £5.80 for a paperback copy of '5:2 Your Life: The fast way to get your life in shape'
text.promo: Get a paperback copy of '5:2 Your Life: The fast way to get your life in shape'. Contains easy-to-follow 7-step plans to self improvement. Areas include money, worry, productivity, relationships and more. Transform your health, wealth and happiness.

text.name: £5 instead of £12.99 (from ResultsWithLucy.com) for a five-week subscription to fitness website - save 62%
text.promo: Enjoy a five-week subscription to ResultsWithLucy.com Bubbly Lucy Mecklenburgh is a former star of TOWIE. Access over 60 of Lucy's workout videos with new vids added weekly. Plus get access to online health and fitness mag and monthly newsletter. Perfect for getting fit in 2014!

text.name: £10 instead of £32.95 (from SalonBoxed) for a 28-day* supply of 'Slimming Patches' - save 70%
text.promo: You'll get a 28-day* 'Slimming Patch' kit. Discreet and easy to use. No more forgetting to take slimming pills! A great aid in your fight against the fat.

text.name: £16.99 instead of £33.60 (from Vybe Ltd) for 24x 250ml cartons of 100% coconut water - save 49%
text.promo: Get 24 cartons of Vybe 100% coconut water. From young green coconuts. Packed with potassium, vitamins and minerals. Only 47kcal per carton. Completely fat and cholesterol free. Favourite among celebrities including Rihanna and Madonna.

text.name: £19 instead of £32 (from GB Supplement) for 60 T5 NEUTRINO 'Fatburner' supplement capsules - save 41% + DELIVERY INCLUDED
text.promo: Get 60 capsules of NEUTRINO T5 'Fatburner' supplements. Manufactured to GMP standard for Best Quality & Safety. Delivery is included!

text.name: £10 instead of £139 (from Evoked Design) for a 5-piece 'Monday to Friday' earrings set - save 93%
text.promo: A 'Monday to Friday' earrings set. Includes five 6mm pairs of 18k white gold-plated earrings. Each pair features Swarovski Elements crystals. Add a little sparkle to your weekdays!

text.name: From £69 instead of up to £309 (from 3 Week Nails) for a home gel manicure starter kit - polish your look and save up to 70%
text.promo: Get a home manicure kit. Inc. UV lamp, base & top coat, cleanser & remover. Choose 4, 6 or 8 high-gloss colour nail polishes. Over 100 colours available inc. Glitz Gal, Ultra Violet & Cherry Up. Plus buffer, orangewood sticks & instructions.

text.name: £19 for a 95-minute pamper package inc. a 30-min massage, 40-min body mask & 25-min manicure at Spray Tan Angels, Clapham
text.promo: Treat yourself to 95-minute pamper package, including: A 30-min neck, back and full body massage & 40-min detox mask. Plus a 25-min manicure. Open Monday-Saturday. Based close to Clapham Junction station. Wowcher Bonus: free eyebrow threading & 30% off course of 4 wraps.
text.warranty: London, London East, London North, London South, London West

text.name: From £9.99 instead of up to £29.99 (from Photocrib) for an aluminium photo print in a choice of sizes - save up to 67%
text.promo: Get a rectangular aluminium photo print in a choice of 6 sizes. Sizes range from 30cm x 20cm to 80cm x 60cm. Images are printed on matte-laminated photo film. Mounted on 3mm aluminium composite. Wall fixings are included. Personalise your walls with a contemporary look.

text.name: £59.99 for a Body Sculpture rowing machine from Wowcher Direct.
text.spec: Northcliffe Digital Building 10 Chiswick Park ,566 Chiswick High Road,London ,W4 5TS
text.promo: Get into shape with a Body Sculpture rowing machine. 12 resistance levels. Adjustable foot plates and incline. Computer monitor which displays calories burned and strokes per minute. Six-wheel carriage for stability and smooth action.

text.name: £24 instead of £100 worth of cleaning with Fingertip Cleaning, London - save 76%
text.promo: Get £100 worth of cleaning. Valid on ovens, hob, End of tenancy & moving out cleaning. Valid Mon-Sat. Professional cleaners. Valid for all London postcodes within M25.
text.warranty: London, London East, London North, London South, London West, Surrey

text.name: £29 for 3 microdermabrasion sessions, or £49 for 5 sessions at Skin Care Laser Clinic
text.promo: Buff your skin with 3 or 5 microdermabrasion sessions. Each session lasts for 30-minutes. Designed to boost & rejuvenate your skin. Friendly and experienced therapists. Based in Birmingham.

text.name: £9.99 (from Diamond Style) for a white gold-plated bracelet, or £14 for a bracelet & Swarovski Elements earrings set - save up to 86%
text.promo: Adorn your wrist with a white gold-plated bracelet. Link bracelet with a classic ring and toggle fixing. Complete the set with a pair of matching Swarovski Elements earrings. Presented in a velvet pouch with a certificate of authenticity. A truly timeless piece of jewellery!

text.name: £29 instead of £120 for a 3D and 4D baby scan inc. 4 3D colour images at Peek a View, Glasgow - save 76%
text.promo: Get a 3D and 4D scan of your baby! Includes a verbal progress report. Plus 4 3D colour images to take home. Experienced sonographers. Locations in Falkirk and Glasgow.

text.name: £34 instead of up to £69 for a half head of highlights, plus a cut and blow dry at Gusto, Soho - treat your tresses and save up to 51%
text.promo: Start with a consultation with an experienced stylist. Then get a half head of highlights. Followed by a wash, cut and blow dry. Ultra modern, chic salon. Valid 7 days a week. Based in Soho.
text.warranty: London, London East, London North, London South, London West

text.name: £4 instead of £10 for a child ticket on a night bus tour of London, £7 for an adult or £19 for a family with London By Night - save up to 60%
text.promo: See the London Eye, Westminster Abbey and more at night. 7 days a week at 7pm and 8:45pm. Hop on, hop off service. Closed top buses will be used in inclement weather. Bus departs from stop Z5, Buckingham Palace Road. A great way to see the sights!
text.warranty: London, London East, London North, London South, London West

text.name: £12 instead of up to £24.24 for a 3-course Japanese-Korean fusion meal at Wokooshii, Manchester - save up to 50%
text.promo: Treat yourself to a three-course Japanese-Korean fusion meal. Enjoy a starter, main and dessert. Dishes inc. Teppanyaki, seafood Bibimbap & crispy apple won ton. Based in Manchester.

text.name: £12 instead of £35 (from Pussycat London) for an eyelash fabric jumper - choose from seven fab designs and save 66%
text.promo: Get an eyelash fabric jumper. Valid in seven fab designs. Made from soft-feel eyelash knit fabric. Machine washable. Sizes S/M (8-12) and L/XL (12-16). Great way to stay warm and stylish this winter.

text.name: £89 for 3 tattoo removal sessions on area up to 4 square inches, £139 on up to 7 square inches at Lorena Öberg - save up to 70%
text.promo: Get 3 laser tattoo removal sessions. Treat any area up to 4 square inches or 7 square inches. Includes consultation with an experienced professional. ND-YAG lasers used. Valid in Harley Street and Caterham, Surrey.
text.warranty: London, London East, London North, London South, London West

text.name: £9.99 instead of up to £29.75 for 4 cocktails and a plate of nachos for 2 at The Telford Arms, Edinburgh - save up to 66%
text.promo: Rated 5 out of 5 on Trip Advisor. Enjoy a night out with 4 cocktails between 2. Plus a mouth-watering plate of nachos. Cocktails inc. Cosmos, White Russians, Mojitos and more. Based in the heart of Edinburgh.

text.name: £29.99 instead of £89.99 (from Juggernet) for a Vonshef professional power juicer - save 67%
text.promo: Get a Vonshef power juicer. Create tasty smoothies & more in minutes. The perfect pal for a healthy lifestyle! 990 watts, 2.5 litre pulp container & 2 speed settings. Available in chrome.

text.name: £9.99 for a pack of 32 Philips AA alkaline batteries from Wowcher Direct + DELIVERY INCLUDED
text.spec: Northcliffe Digital Building 10 Chiswick Park ,566 Chiswick High Road,London ,W4 5TS
text.promo: Get a pack of 32 AA batteries. Alkaline has 6x the lifespan of average zinc carbon battery. Top brand Philips. Don't get caught short again! Delivery is included.

text.name: £10 instead of £25 for a 90-minute cocktail masterclass inc. 3 cocktails & a glass of bubbly each at Chilli White, Liverpool- shake, serve and save 60%
text.promo: Enjoy a 90-minute cocktail making class inc. glass of bubbly on arrival. Make 3 cocktails - and drink them! Choose a classic, Cuban or martini class. Valid Mon-Sun, 11am-8pm. Wowcher Bonus: Free club entry before 11pm on the day of your class.

text.name: £4.99 instead of £17.99 (from Quick Style) for a heated eyelash curling wand - get fluttering and save 72%
text.promo: Enjoy this new curling tool to get fabulous lashes. Heats up to 40°C to create the perfect curl. Compact and portable size so it's perfect to use on the go. Runs on one AAA battery. A must-have in any makeup bag.

text.name: £7.99 instead of £25.98 for 300ml Argan Oil shampoo and 300ml conditioner from Wowcher Direct - save 69% + DELIVERY INCLUDED!
text.promo: Get an Argan Oil shampoo & conditioner. 300ml bottle of each. Aims to help hydrate and revitalise dry hair. Delivery is included! Start 2014 looking fabulous.

text.name: £12 instead of up to £25.50 for a 3-course Sunday lunch for 2 people at Vincenzo's, Newcastle - save up to 53%
text.promo: Enjoy a 3-course Sunday lunch for 2 people. Starters include: soup of the day or pate with red onion jam. Mains include: braised beef with red wine gravy, roast belly pork & more. Finish with sticky toffee pudding & vanilla pod ice cream. Wowcher Bonus: Kids eat for just £3.95 and get a drink & dessert. Buzzing Italian restaurant that's rated 4* on Trip Advisor.

text.name: £5 instead of £10.20 (from Avanquest) for a driving test DVD, £12 for premium version – save up to 51%
text.promo: Get set for your driving test with a DVD including: Theory, practical & hazard perception modules. Upgrade for a premium DVD which also features: Driving lesson reference tools & car maintenance material. Perfect for beginners.

text.name: £16.99 instead of £43 (from Groundlevel) for a Keep Calm and Snooze On throw in a choice of colours – save 60%
text.promo: Stay warm with a Keep Calm and Snooze On throw. Valid in black, mink, navy, pink and red. Measures 150cm x 200cm. Machine washable soft-touch polyester.

text.name: From £899 for a full wedding package inc. a choice of 4 options at The Blazing Donkey Country Hotel, Sandwich - save up to 74%
text.promo: Get married in style! A choice of 4 packages to suit your budget and number of guests. Ranging from 'Intimate' for 25 guests to 'Platinum' for 150 (see below). Inc. wedding breakfast, wine, four poster room and more. Experienced wedding planners. Based in Sandwich, Kent.
text.warranty: Essex, Kent, London, London East, London North, London South, London West, Surrey

text.name: £15 instead of £45 for a 1-hour back, neck & shoulder massage at The Good Life, Middleton - save a soothing 67%
text.promo: Relax and unwind with a luxury back, neck & shoulder massage. Total treatment time is an hour. Experienced therapists. Open Monday to Saturday. Based in Middleton.

text.name: £10 for 4 dance classes for 1, £14 for 6 classes or £18 for 4 classes for 2, £22 for 6 for 2 at Dees Dancing – save up to 64%
text.promo: Take up dance this year with 4 or 6 classes. Choose samba, waltz, tango and much more. Classes take place Mon-Weds evening. Valid in 3 Glasgow locations. Great for your New Year fitness regime.

text.name: £99 for 6 IPL sessions on half legs & 1 small area, £179 for full legs & 1 med/2 small areas, at Desire Hair & Beauty, Sparkbrook - save up to 91%
text.desc: Six Sessions of IPL Hair Removal
text.promo: Get six sessions of IPL hair removal. Opt for half legs and one small area. Or upgrade for full legs or arms and one medium or two small areas. Lovely, fuzz-free skin can be yours in 2014!

text.name: £19 instead of £45 for a full set of semi-permanent eyelash extensions with Hair, Laser & Beauty by Hawa, Leicester - save 58%
text.promo: Get sexy, longer lashes. Semi-permanent individual lash extensions used. Applied by a friendly & experienced technician. Based in Leicester.
